lines.text: Ratio of work output to input

definitions.def: Ratio of work output to work input.

secText: We discuss efficiency as it relates to machines.

The efficiency of a machine equals the ratio of the work it does, or its output, divided by the work supplied, or the input. A 100% efficient machine would convert all the work supplied to the work it does. However, factors like friction and air resistance mean machines are less than 100% efficient.
The equation shows how efficiency is calculated.  The ratio has no unit.
